summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 22.901E.010, 22.901P.040, 23.44.025, 23.45.005, 23.47.004, 23.76.032, 23.84.008, 23.84.028, 23.90.006 and 23.90.019 of the Seattle Municipal Code (SMC), and adding a new Section 23.44.041 to the SMC, amending the regulations for accessory dwelling units and the permit fees related thereto.
